vv84:7.4: Vaṅkaṃ bhayā → vaṅkaṃ bhayaṃ (bj) | vaṅkambhayā (s2, s3) | dhaṅkaṃbhayā (mr)
vv84:10.1: kena → kena nu (s2, s3, pts1, mr)
vv84:18.3: cime → dumā ca te (s2, s3, mr)
vv84:21.3: vaggu ca susaṅgato ca → vaggu sumukho susaṃgato (bj) | vaggū ca susaṅgato ca (s2, s3)
vv84:36.1: ca sirīsavanā → ime sirīsūpavanā ca (bj) | ime sirisapavanā (s2, s3) | ime pi sirīsapavarā ca (pts1) | ime pi sirīsavanā ca (pts2, mr)
vv84:36.2: Dibbā → dibbā ca (pts1, mr), surabhī → surabhiṃ (bj, pts2, mr), sampavanti → pavanti (s2, s3) | sampavāyanti (mr)
vv84:48.3: teniha → tenīha (bj) | te na hi (s2, s3), bhasmī → bhasmi (s2, s3) | bhasma (mr)
vv84:53.2: purakkhatvā → purakkhipitvā (bj, pts2) | purakkhitvā (s2, s3, pts1)
vv84:57.3: Ānandī vittā → ānandacittā (s2, s3) | anandacittā (pts1) | ānandīcittā (mr)
